snippet: On the eve of the final day of men’s fashion week in Italy’s capital, fashion heavyweights converged to celebrate the appointment of Brendan Monaghan as the magazine’s new publisher.
abstract: On the eve of the final day of men’s fashion week in Italy’s capital, fashion heavyweights converged to celebrate the appointment of Brendan Monaghan as the magazine’s new publisher.

headline.main: Cocktails Under an 18th-Century Fresco in Milan to Fete a New Star at T
